mapper.sql: cid, ccreatedatetime, cmodifydatetime, cname, cpwd, email, district_id, fullname, telephone, profession, jobs, company, address
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tuser
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tuser (ccreatedatetime, cmodifydatetime, cname, cpwd, email, district_id, fullname, telephone, profession, jobs, company, address) values (#{ccreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cmodifydatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tuser
ccreatedatetime,
cmodifydatetime,
cname,
cpwd,
email,
district_id,
fullname,
telephone,
profession,
jobs,
company,
address,

mapper.update:
update tuser
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ccreatedatetime = #{record.ccreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cmodifydatetime = #{record.cmodifydatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpwd = #{record.cpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_id = #{record.districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fullname = #{record.fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{record.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{record.profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobs = #{record.jobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{record.company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tuser set cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ccreatedatetime = #{record.ccreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cmodifydatetime = #{record.cmodifydatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpwd = #{record.cpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_id = #{record.districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fullname = #{record.fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{record.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{record.profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobs = #{record.jobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{record.company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tuser
ccreatedatetime = #{ccreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cmodifydatetime = #{cmodifydatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpwd = #{cpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobs = #{jobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tuser set ccreatedatetime = #{ccreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cmodifydatetime = #{cmodifydatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpwd = #{cpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobs = #{jobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(distinct(t.cid)) AS num FROM tuser t LEFT JOIN tusertrole ur ON t.cid = ur.cuserid

SELECT DISTINCT t5.cid, t5.cname, t5.cdesc, t5.curl, t5.cpid, t5.cseq, t5.menu_level AS menulevel, t5.token, t5.category, t5.rpt_filename AS rptfilename, t5.menu_icon AS menuicon FROM tuser t1, tusertrole t2, trole t3, troletauth t4, tauth t5 WHERE 1 = 1 AND t5.menu_level != -1 AND t1.cid = t2.cuserid AND t2.croleid = t3.cid AND t3.cid = t4.croleid AND t4.cauthid = t5.cid AND t1.cid = #{userid} ORDER BY cpid DESC, cseq

SELECT DISTINCT t5.cid, t5.cname, t5.cdesc, t5.curl, t5.cpid, t5.cseq, t5.menu_level AS menulevel, t5.token, t5.category, t5.rpt_filename AS rptfilename, t5.menu_icon AS menuicon FROM tuser t1, tusertrole t2, trole t3, troletauth t4, tauth t5 WHERE 1 = 1 AND t5.menu_level != -1 AND t1.cid = t2.cuserid AND t2.croleid = t3.cid AND t3.cid = t4.croleid AND t4.cauthid = t5.cid AND t1.cid = #{userid} And t5.category = 'header' ORDER BY cpid DESC, cseq

SELECT DISTINCT t5.cid, t5.cname, t5.cdesc, t5.curl, t5.cpid, t5.cseq, t5.menu_level AS menulevel, t5.token, t5.category, t5.rpt_filename AS rptfilename, t5.menu_icon AS menuicon FROM tuser t1, tusertrole t2, trole t3, troletauth t4, tauth t5 WHERE 1 = 1 AND t5.menu_level != -1 AND t1.cid = t2.cuserid AND t2.croleid = t3.cid AND t3.cid = t4.croleid AND t4.cauthid = t5.cid AND t1.cid = #{userId} And t5.cpid = #{menuId} ORDER BY cpid DESC, cseq
